items.title: Fix RackBay facilityId TS error
items.reason: Smoke test only — real fix needed in radl codebase

items.title: Fix Team create facility relation TS error
items.reason: Smoke test only — real fix needed in radl codebase

items.title: Prisma client regeneration needed at build time
items.reason: Generated types were stale — facilityId showed as required instead of optional. Fixed with prisma generate but gitignored files won't persist.

items.title: verifyFacilityAdmin duplicated in activity route
items.reason: Same auth pattern duplicated in 6+ facility routes — extract to shared helper. Resolved: Phase 91 replaced inline with import from @/lib/auth/facility.

items.title: Multi-child parent dashboard
items.reason: Dashboard only shows first linked athlete; multi-child support deferred. Superseded by #25.

items.title: Contact Coach button in parent empty state
items.reason: Low priority UX enhancement for parent with no linked athlete. Superseded by #26.

items.title: Extract dashboard data fetching branches
items.reason: Dashboard page.tsx approaching 400 lines; could extract coach/parent/athlete branches. Resolved: dashboard refactored in Phase 69+.

items.title: aria-labels for icon-only buttons
items.reason: ~60-80 buttons need labels, estimated 3-5 hours of careful audit. Superseded by #27.

items.title: Oversized components (15 files >400 lines)
items.reason: Requires careful refactoring judgment per component, not mechanical

items.title: Component/E2E test coverage
items.reason: Zero component tests currently, large effort needs dedicated sprint. Superseded by #28.

items.title: Remaining 14 mutation routes without Zod
items.reason: Most are action-only (no body to validate), low risk. Assessed Phase 91: 60+ inline schemas but all routes already validate — low ROI to consolidate.

items.title: ConfirmDialog unit tests
items.reason: No existing test patterns for shared UI components — better as part of a test coverage sprint. Superseded by #29.

items.title: ConfirmDialog CSS variable destructive colors
items.reason: Hardcoded red-600 works for now, should use theme variables when theming is revisited. Resolved: Phase 91 replaced with CSS variables.

items.title: Date range validation on practice duplication
items.reason: Medium priority from security review — coach could create practices with unreasonable dates. Resolved: validation added in Phase 85.

items.title: Improve error handling in checklist dismiss
items.reason: Medium priority from security review — errors silently swallowed. Resolved: error handling fixed in Phase 85.

items.title: Extract parent dashboard queries to separate module
items.reason: page.tsx approaching 500+ lines — code review recommended extraction. Resolved: dashboard refactored in Phase 69+.

items.title: Add resource caching with TTL
items.reason: MEDIUM security review finding - subprocess spawning on every resource read. Low risk for single-user stdio MCP.

items.title: Extract shared test mock utility
items.reason: LOW code review finding - mock server pattern duplicated across 9 test files.

items.title: Add Zod .max() constraints to prompt arguments
items.reason: LOW security review finding - string args have no length limits.

items.title: Make file paths configurable via env vars
items.reason: MEDIUM code review finding - hardcoded /home/hb paths reduce portability.

items.title: Google Calendar MCP OAuth setup
items.reason: Requires user to create OAuth credentials in Google Cloud Console — blocking dependency. Resolved: Phase 88 fully implemented.

items.title: Gmail briefing delivery via Google Workspace MCP
items.reason: Blocked on Google OAuth setup. Resolved: Phase 88 fully implemented.

items.title: Critical alert system via Gmail
items.reason: Blocked on Google OAuth setup — needs Gmail send capability. Resolved: Phase 88 fully implemented.

items.title: Production status test coverage — behavioral tests
items.reason: Code reviewer flagged smoke-only tests, need proper mocking of fetch calls. Superseded by #32.

items.title: Multi-child parent dashboard
items.reason: Medium feature work — needs design for multi-athlete selector UX. Resolved: already implemented (pill selector + parallel data fetching).

items.title: Contact Coach button in parent empty state
items.reason: Needs coach data fetch from API — not a simple text change. Resolved: Phase 91 added Contact Coach mailto button.

items.title: aria-labels for icon-only buttons
items.reason: Large accessibility sweep across full codebase. Resolved: Phase 91 added aria-labels to 13 components.

items.title: Component/E2E test coverage
items.reason: Infrastructure investment — needs Playwright setup and test patterns. Resolved: Playwright configured + 4 E2E tests + auth fixtures + ConfirmDialog unit tests (Phase 91).

items.title: ConfirmDialog unit tests
items.reason: No existing test patterns for shared UI components. Resolved: Phase 91 added 11 unit tests with vitest + testing-library.

items.title: Gmail briefing delivery via Google Workspace MCP
items.reason: Radl-ops feature — needs briefing template + Gmail API integration. Resolved: Phase 88 fully implemented.

items.title: Critical alert system via Gmail
items.reason: Radl-ops feature — needs polling script + alert rules. Resolved: Phase 88 fully implemented.

items.title: Production status test coverage
items.reason: Radl-ops tests — needs fetch mocking for Vercel/Sentry/Supabase APIs. Resolved: Phase 91 added 40 behavioral tests with URL-based fetch dispatch.

items.title: HTML entity escaping in markdownToHtml
items.reason: M3 from security review: LLM output could contain raw HTML. Resolved: Phase 91 added escapeHtml() before regex chain.

items.title: Rotate Anthropic API key (in git history from Phase 57)
items.reason: M1 from security review: sk-ant-api03 key found in commit 26c618070. Pre-existing, not introduced by this branch.

items.title: Session health behavioral tests for signal detectors
items.reason: MEDIUM from code review: no tests for new action_repetition detector or other signal detectors. Resolved: Phase 91 added 74 behavioral tests covering all 7 detectors.

items.title: Extract quality gates from sprint.ts into shared/quality-gates.ts
items.reason: sprint.ts at 981 lines exceeds 800-line limit

items.title: Expand createAntibodyCore return type to include full Antibody
items.reason: Eliminates redundant store re-read in MCP handler

items.title: Crystallization ID collision under concurrent writes
items.reason: Low risk in single-process MCP, but should switch to randomUUID

items.title: Lineup count cap per block in template apply endpoint
items.reason: M-2 security finding — no cap on number of lineups per block. Low risk since coach-only endpoint.

items.title: iCal calendar subscription feed
items.reason: Requires new Prisma schema (CalendarToken model), not a bug fix — separate sprint

items.title: Lineup count cap per block in template apply endpoint
items.reason: Pre-existing from Phase 101, not addressed in this UX sprint

items.title: Push notification VAPID key generation + Edge Function deployment
items.reason: Ops/config task requiring manual steps — not code changes. VAPID keys, env vars, supabase functions deploy.

items.title: Season manager component at 747 lines — extract schedule builder
items.reason: Near 800 line limit but functional. Extract ScheduleBuilder sub-component when next touched.

items.title: Remaining ~60 teal references in files outside Phase 104 scope (equipment, roster, invitations, compliance)
items.reason: Phase 107 will sweep these as part of page-by-page polish

items.title: iCal feed rate limiting (M-1 from security review)
items.reason: Pre-existing, not a regression. Needs Upstash integration on public endpoint

items.title: Pass clubId as prop to PermissionGrantsSection (M-2 from security review)
items.reason: Server guard is solid, client-side improvement for defence-in-depth

items.title: feature-flags-settings.tsx still uses setTimeout success pattern instead of toast
items.reason: Missed in T3 settings sweep, minor inconsistency

items.title: Equipment checkout tab UX — remove confusing Check In tab or make it functional
items.reason: Need to investigate the full checkout/checkin flow more deeply before changing it

items.title: Skip for now in athlete wizard calls handleComplete instead of complete
items.reason: Pre-existing bug: 'Skip for now' saves empty preferences instead of just closing wizard. Low impact since preferences are all optional.

items.title: N+1 query: RSVP attendance fetched separately from practice query
items.reason: Could be joined into the main practice query with include. Functional as-is, minor performance hit.

items.title: T2 spec_compliance tests missing in phase111.test.ts
items.reason: Test header claims T2 coverage but no describe block exists. Handler extraction works but no assertions.

items.title: Level 3 wired check uses naive basename grep
items.reason: grep for basename produces false positives (matches comments, vars). Should narrow to import statement pattern.

items.title: Add trace file size cap (50MB daily limit)
items.reason: M-2 from security review: no file size limit on JSONL trace files prevents unbounded growth

items.title: Add Zod schemas for external API response validation in data fetchers
items.reason: M-4 from security review: TypeScript casts instead of runtime validation on Vercel/Sentry/GitHub responses

items.title: Export WaveInfo interface from decisions.ts
items.reason: Medium code review finding: interface used in exported signatures but not exported itself

items.title: Add entry text lookup for VEC-only results in knowledge_query
items.reason: Vector-only results show raw entry IDs instead of content. Need getEntryText() helper in fts-index.ts.

items.title: Add output sanitization to session recovery formatRecoveryMarkdown
items.reason: Control chars/ANSI escapes in JSONL content could inject misleading context into hook output.

items.title: Split boundary value tests into separate it blocks for better fault isolation
items.reason: Code reviewer flagged dual-assertion tests as reducing diagnostic clarity on failure

items.title: Add ENOENT-differentiated logging to config load (not just SyntaxError)
items.reason: Security reviewer recommended logging EACCES/EISDIR separately from silent ENOENT fallback

items.title: Wrap vector index DELETE+rebuild in single transaction
items.reason: indexAllKnowledge() DELETEs then rebuilds outside a single transaction — partial failure leaves empty table. Security review Medium-2.

items.title: Harden shell hook python3 path interpolation to use sys.argv
items.reason: session-stop.sh and pre-compact.sh interpolate paths into python3 -c strings. Safe with hardcoded paths but fragile. Security review Medium-1.
